```{r}
user_1_info_file <-here("data-raw/mmash/user_1/user_info.csv")
user_1_info_data <- vroom(
    user_1_info_file,
    col_select = -1,
    col_types = cols(
        gender = col_character(),
        weight = col_double(),
        height = col_double(),
        age = col_double(),
        .delim = ","
    ),
    .name_repair = snakecase::to_snake_case
)
```
